list.question: Is my child's information secure?
list.answer: Yes. We use strict security practices and never disclose your child's data without consent.

list.question: Can I choose between online and in-clinic sessions?
list.answer: Absolutely. You can filter therapists by format and pick what works best for your family.

list.question: Do therapists have verified credentials?
list.answer: Every therapist on Paxify is licensed and vetted. Profiles include expertise, styles, and reviews.

list.question: How do reminders and updates work?
list.answer: We send appointment reminders, changes, and invoices to your inbox to keep everything clear.

items.question: How can I book a same day appointment?
items.answer: Use our Find Therapists page to filter by availability and choose a time that works for you.

items.question: Do you accept medical insurance?
items.answer: Yes. Availability depends on the therapist. You can filter by insurance from the filters.

items.question: Can I choose a therapist by gender?
items.answer: Absolutely. Use the Gender filter when searching.

items.question: Is online therapy available?
items.answer: Yes, many of our therapists offer secure video sessions.

items.question: How are therapists rated?
items.answer: Ratings come from verified patient reviews after each session.

items.question: What is general practice?
items.answer: General practice covers comprehensive health care for people of all ages.

items.question: What diseases does a general practitioner treat?
items.answer: From common colds to chronic conditions, GPs coordinate your ongoing care.

items.question: What are Vitamin D deficiency symptoms?
items.answer: Fatigue, bone pain, mood changes, and frequent illness.
